name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Enter Session (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-ENTER_SESSION: The client on interface Gi0/1 has entered the OAM session.

patterns.value_re: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-ENTER_SESSION: The client on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has entered the OAM session

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Exit Session (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-EXIT_SESSION: The client on interface Gi0/1 has left the OAM session.

patterns.value_re: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-EXIT_SESSION: The client on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has left the OAM session

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Client Recieved Remote Failure (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI: The client on interface Gi0/1 has received a remote failure indication from its remote peer(failure reason = remote client down action = )
event_class__name: Network | OAM | Client Recieved Remote Failure

patterns.value_re: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI: The client on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has received a remote failure indication from its remote peer\s*\(failure reason = (?P<reason>.+)\)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Client Clear Remote Failure (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI_CLEAR: The client on interface %s has received a clear of remote failure indication from its remote peer(failure reason = %s action = %s)
event_class__name: Network | OAM | Client Clear Remote Failure

patterns.value_re: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI_CLEAR: The client on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has received a clear of remote failure indication from its remote peer\s*\(failure reason = (?P<reason>.+)\)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Monitoring Error (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-5-LINK_MONITOR: 121507 rx CRC errors detected over the last 180 seconds on interface Fa0/24

patterns.value_re: %ETHERNET_OAM-5-LINK_MONITOR: (?P<error>.+) errors detected over the last .+ on interface (?P<interface>\S+)
